negotiation_message: Alice said in round 1: Hi Alfonso, I'm looking forward to negotiating with you to split up these items. Based on my evaluation, the hats seem to be the most valuable items to me. I would propose that I take the 2 hats, and you can have the 4 books and the ball. How does that sound to you? Let me know if you have a different proposal in mind.
alfonso replied in round 1: I agree
Alice said in round 2: halt negotiation
alfonso replied in round 2: halto negotiation
Alice said in round 1: halt negotiation
alfonso replied in round 1: halt negotiation
